programme.title: Gila - Gila Pengantin Remaja
programme.desc: Pasangan remaja yang bakal menduduki peperiksaan SPM, Amir dan Mastura berikrar ingin berkahwin selepas tamatnya pengajian di universiti. Namun, Fandi yang juga rakan sekelas Mastura mencemburui percintaan mereka. SPM pun tiba tetapi Mastura terlewat menghadiri ujian Matematik dan berasa amat kecewa kerana menganggap dia telah pun gagal. Kakak Mastura, Anita pula ingin Mastura mencari calon suami yang kaya. Perasaan kecewa mula menyelubungi diri Amir apabila mendapat tahu Mastura ditunangkan dengan Fandi. Mengetahui perihal sebenar mengapa mereka akan dikahwinkan, Amir membawa Mastura lari ke selatan Thailand. Bermulalah kekecohan antara mereka semua dalam sekuel kepada Gila-Gila Pengantin ini.

programme.title: Puteri Impian
programme.desc: Pekerja kilang, Puteri Nora sentiasa mengimpikan untuk menjadi seorang puteri raja. Impiannya menjadi kenyataan apabila dia diterima menyertai pertandingan "Memburu Impian". Kehidupannya berubah sekelip mata apabila bertemu Tengku Faizal, seorang putera raja. Namun, Zul, jurukameranya dalam rancangan itu turut menyukai Puteri Nora. Pilihan harus dibuat antara kemewahan atau kebebasan.

programme.title: Bukan Cinta Malaikat
programme.desc: Reyhan, seorang sukarelawan Muslim Care yang berasal dari Bandung jatuh hati kepada gadis Malaysia bernama Dewi sejak dia menyelamatkan Dewi daripada satu insiden ketika mereka berada di Madinah. Walau bagaimanapun, cinta Reyhan itu terhalang apabila Dewi mempunyai kekasih bernama Adam. Dalam masa yang sama, seorang gadis bernama Aliyah pula menaruh hati kepada Reyhan.

programme.title: XX Ray
programme.desc: Obsesinya terhadap angkasa lepas telah membuatkan Amir untuk mencipta sebuah topi keledar. Topi keledar ini merupakan penemuan baru apabila ia menggunakan kuasa tahi bintang. Sesiapa sahaja yang memakainya boleh melihat menembusi apa sahaja yang mereka inginkan. Kekacauan berlaku apabila topi itu telah menyebabkan Amir bertukar menjadi halimunan.

programme.title: Puteri Impian 2
programme.desc: Gadis kilang yang menolak lamaran seorang kerabat diraja Tengku Faizal, menaruh hati terhadap jurukamera stesen televisyen, Zul. Nora menyukai Zul tetapi dia telah pun menjalin hubungan bersama Lisa. Adik kepada Tengku Faizal, Tengku Farid ingin membawa semula Nora kembali ke abangnya. Tekad, dia ingin mengangkat semula maruah abangnya.

programme.title: Femina
programme.desc: Perjuangan untuk mendapatkan hak setara antara jantina terutamanya wanita lantang dibicarakan di dalam majalah Femina. Tina, tegas memperjuangkan pendiriannya manakala Anita tidak berapa menyukai cara Tina. Femina telah menjadi satu platform anti-lelaki. Pertemuan Tina bersama Pyan mula mengubah pandangan ekstrem Tina namun perasaan dilema mula menguasai diri apabila dituduh sebagai pembelot wanita.

programme.title: XX Ray 2
programme.desc: Bekerja sebagai saintis kadet, Tina berasa ditipu apabila Johan mendakwa dia yang mencipta mesin pelupusan laser walhal ia merupakan hasil cetusan idea dari Tina. Ingin menghalang niat jahat Johan, Tina meminta bantuan Amir. Namun, keduanya terkena pancaran laser mesin itu dalam cubaan untuk menghalang Johan dan telah dihantar ke zaman Kesultanan Melayu Melaka.

programme.title: Azura 2012
programme.desc: Azura, seorang gadis remaja yang gigih hadapi cabaran hidup untuk mencapai cita-citanya. Dia tinggal bersama ibu saudaranya setelah kedua ibu bapanya meninggal dunia dalam satu tragedi. Azura kemudiannya menjadi mahasiswa di sebuah universiti swasta dan menjalinkan hubungan mesra dengan Zek, seorang anak hartawan. Walau bagaimanapun, cinta mereka dihalang oleh bapa Zek dan mereka terpaksa melalui pelbagai dugaan.

programme.title: Baginda
programme.desc: Diwariskan untuk mengurus sebuah kolej swasta di Johor Bahru oleh pakciknya, Azian terpaksa melalui pelbagai cabaran untuk menaikkan semula martabat sekolah yang sudah merudum prestasinya itu. Hampir sahaja putus asa namun sikap dedikasinya untuk mendidik anak bangsa membuatkan Azian ingin terus menjalankan amanah pakciknya.

programme.title: Setinggan
programme.desc: Penduduk di suatu setingan diganggu hantu. Mereka berkerja sama untuk mencari jalan penyelesaian. Akhirnya mereka berjaya menghalau hantu daripada menggangu setinggan mereka.

programme.title: Senja Merah
programme.desc: Mahmud, seorang taikun yang berkahwin dengan seorang janda yang mempunyai seorang anak lelaki, Zubaidah adalah pengusaha restoran. Baharum, anak kepada zubaidah berkawan dengan Mahmud anak angkat Mira sejak kecil. Apabila dewasa, hubungan mereka semakin kuat dan mereka saling menyayangi. Maher, bimbang harta peninggalan bapanya akan jatuh ke tangan mereka berdua.

programme.title: Seutas Gelang Emas
programme.desc: Adam tinggal dengan ibunya di kampung. Berjawatan tinggi dan bergaji besar menyebabkan ibunya, Hasnah cukup bangga. Satu hari Bedah, penjual barang kemas, datang ke rumahnya untuk mengajak ke kenduri doa selamat. Di samping itu Bedah membuka juga barangan kemasnya. Hasnah tertarik pada seutas gelang tangan tetapi Adam tidak mengendahkannya

programme.title: Tmo Jangan Ambil Nyawa Aku
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Jangan Ambil Nyawa Aku

programme.title: Misterius
programme.desc: Kematian Sumiyati membawa malapetaka kepada keluarga Lestari Soecipto. Sumiyati merupakan pekerja sebuah syarikat pakaian milik Lestari, seorang balu anak dua iaitu Agus dan Wulan. Keluarga Lestari sering didatangi roh-roh yang mengembara. Lestari memanggil orang yang bijak, Pak Gozali. Encik Gozali mendedahkan segala rahsia tentang roh yang mengembara ini.

programme.title: Cipali Km 182
programme.desc: Beberapa kemalangan di tol Cikopo–Palimanan (aka Cipali) telah menarik perhatian orang ramai. Ramai yang percaya bahawa pembinaan jalan itu mempunyai kisah mistik: terdapat timbunan batu misteri di tepi jalan utama.

programme.title: Salah Bapak
programme.desc: Amran seorang budak Delivery yang gemar berlumba secara haram motor Drag. Satu hari selepas memenagi satu perlumbaan, Amran telah di hadiahkan seorang perempuan bernama Maya sebagai habuan perlumbaan. Malang tidak berbau, mereka telah kemalangan dan Maya mati ditempat kejadian.

programme.title: Demi Raya
programme.desc: Dua beradik Ika dan Adik, nekad membantu ayahnya balik kampung beraya setelah 2 tahun pandemik ditambah ayahnya baru diberhentikan kerja. Demi Raya, mereka merancang untuk masuk pertandingan Karaokick dan menang RM10,000.

programme.title: Hening Senja
programme.desc: Mengisahkan kehidupan sebuah keluarga yang bekerja dan berada di puncak . Si isteri masih belum bersedia untuk mempunyai zuriat manakala si suami sudah tidak sabar lagi untuk menimang cahaya mata .

programme.title: Keeping Your Heart
programme.desc: Trang mempunyai keluarga yang sempurna, isteri yang baik dengan anak perempuan dan anak lelaki. Dia teragak-agak apabila Tawanwad, seorang artis wanita, datang ke dalam hidupnya. Dia terpaksa memilih antara tugas atau perasaan di hatinya.

programme.title: Jom Wayang S14 Ep20
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: From London To Bali
programme.desc: Krisya yang telah jatuh cinta terhadap seorang jejaka bernama Irfan. Bagaimanapun cintanya ditolak kerana Irfan lebih tertarik kepada wanita `berisi`. Oleh itu, Krisya kini nekad untuk menaikkan badannya demi jejaka impiannya.

programme.title: My Stupid Boss
programme.desc: Seorang perempuan indonesia datang ke kuala lumpur mengikut suaminya. Setelah berada di kuala lumpur dia berhasrat untuk bekerja di syarikat milik rakan suaminya. Majikannya itu merupakan seorang yang memiliki sikap dan perangai yang membuatnya sentiasa berada dalam keadaan serba salah dan tertekan. Sikap majikannya yang tidak mahu membayar hutang, menuduhnya mengambil wang syarikat dan tidak membayar gaji menyebabkan dia nekad untuk berhenti kerja. Namun kisah berakhir apabila dia bersetuju untuk bekerja semula apabila majikannya memintanya menguruskan kerja-kerja kebajikan membaiki rumah anak yatim.

programme.title: Cipali Km 182
programme.desc: Beberapa kemalangan di tol Cikopo–Palimanan (aka Cipali) telah menarik perhatian orang ramai. Ramai yang percaya bahawa pembinaan jalan itu mempunyai kisah mistik: terdapat timbunan batu misteri di tepi jalan utama.

programme.title: Hello Suria !

Beliau berminat untuk bekerja dengan sebuah firma Jepun di Malaysia. Sebelum dilantik beliau dikehendaki menjalani internship selama dua bulan dengan sebuah syarikat di Jepun.

programme.title: Gerak Khas The Movie Iii

programme.title: The Trial
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki yang mengalami gangguan mental dibicarakan selepas didakwa merogol gurunya. Dalam proses Pembelaan Amanda, Julian dan Ronald mereka rasakan ada satu ikatan antara mereka bukan hanya sekadar kes.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep113
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Selamanya Cinta
programme.desc: Rangga dan Cinta memutuskan untuk berkahwin. Rangga sentiasa sibuk dengan kerja sebagai doktor, jadi Cinta merancang perkahwinan mereka. Wabak COVID-19 merebak tanpa diduga ke seluruh dunia. Rangga juga bertanggungjawab merawat pesakit siang dan malam sehingga dijangkiti COVID-19. Dia memutuskan untuk membatalkan perkahwinan itu.

programme.title: The Sultan S2 Ep54
programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.

programme.title: Halo Selebriti Ep5
programme.desc: Program infotainment yang menyajikan berita harian tentang selebriti Indonesia.

programme.title: Golden Memories Asia Ep18

programme.title: The Girl On A Bulldozer
programme.desc: As the girl seeks truth behind the sudden car accident of her father, anger and despair left her only one option.

programme.title: Love Guide For Dumpees
programme.desc: Two recently dumped singles spend a wild drunken night together to get over their exes, then agree to meet nine more times before promising never to see other again.

programme.title: Marriage Blue
programme.desc: The misadventures of 4 couples a week before their wedding.

programme.title: Penny Pinchers
programme.desc: A money-saving young woman teams up with an unemployed loser in money-raising schemes, resulting in some hilarious mishaps and a blossoming romance.

programme.title: The Pension
programme.desc: When four different couples head to a motel for different reasons, truths are revealed and secrets are uncovered.

programme.title: The Berlin File
programme.desc: A North Korean agent in Berlin is betrayed and cut loose when a weapons deal is exposed. He tries to escape being purged, while being pursued by a North and South Korean operative.

programme.title: Master
programme.desc: An intellectual crime investigation team goes after One Network, a company involved in a massive fraud and corruption case in Korea.

programme.title: Tunnel
programme.desc: While driving home for his daughter's birthday, a man gets trapped in a collapsed tunnel and struggles to survive with just two bottles of water, a birthday cake and a cell phone.

programme.title: More Than Family
programme.desc: College student To-il was pregnant for 5 months and decided to marry her younger boyfriend. Her mother and stepfather opposed the decision, she hence set off to find her biological father.

programme.title: Mal-Mo-E: The Secret Mission
programme.desc: During the Japanese occupation in the 1940s, two men work together to secretly create a dictionary of the Korean language when the language was banned.

programme.title: Hot Blooded
programme.desc: A small and quiet port in Busan outskirt became the battlefield of local gangsters.

programme.title: In Our Prime
programme.desc: Genius Mathematician defected from the North tried to hide his past eventually started teaching a student who gave up on Maths the right way to find the answer.

programme.title: Oh! My Gran
programme.desc: When his daughter suffer from a hit-and-run accident, her father tries to track down the driver with help from his mother who has Alzheimer's disease and the only witness to this accident.

programme.title: Broken
programme.desc: Two teenage boys raped and murdered Sang-hyun's daughter. The infuriated father unintensionally killed one of the murderer and became a fugitive himself...

programme.title: The Pension
programme.desc: When four different couples head to a motel for different reasons, truths are revealed and secrets are uncovered.

programme.title: Sinkhole
programme.desc: As the family celebrates their purchases of a new condo after 11 years of effort, the building was engulfed in a sinkhole due to heavy downpour.

programme.title: Friend: The Great Legacy
programme.desc: Joonsuk recruited Sunghoon, a young guy he met in prison, to help him in the gang. Little did he know Sunghoon was the son of Dongsu, whom he was suspected to kill.

programme.title: Unbowed
programme.desc: A math professor was not re-hired for pointing out errors in the university entrance exam. Losing the lawsuit against the university, he carries his crossbow to the judge for justice.

programme.title: The Goblin
programme.desc: After ten years in jail, Doohyun is released and wants nothing more than to live an ordinary life, but when his old partner kidnaps his daughter, the long-hidden Goblin inside him awakes.

programme.title: Marriage Blue
programme.desc: The misadventures of 4 couples a week before their wedding.

programme.title: The Tenor - Lirico Spinto
programme.desc: A strong partnership and friendship begins when a talented Korean vocalist met a Japanese music producer. At the peak of his career, he was diagnosed with thyroid cancer and might loss his voice...

programme.title: Waiting For Rain
programme.desc: An unmotivated student regains his passion for life after exchanging letters with his childhood friend and promise to meet if it rains on December 31st each year.

programme.title: The House
programme.desc: A young couple moves back to their hometown in hopes of starting a family. But when dark memories from their past begin to surface, strange things begin to happen in their house.

programme.title: Love Guide For Dumpees
programme.desc: Two recently dumped singles spend a wild drunken night together to get over their exes, then agree to meet nine more times before promising never to see other again.

programme.title: Innocence
programme.desc: A hotshot lawyer uncovers the conspiracy of a small village while defending her estranged mother, who has Alzheimer's disease and accused of killing the attendees at her husband’s funeral.

programme.title: By Quantum Physics: A Nightlife Venture
programme.desc: A nightclub owner, his club manager and a police officer must wash their hands off a drug abuse case that involves high-profile figures, in order to save their own lives.

programme.title: Memories Of The Sword
programme.desc: 3 warriors pledge to fight against an incompetent king. However, a betrayal occurs leading to the death of one of the warriors. 18 years later, the daughter of the betrayed sets out to get revenge.

programme.title: My Little Bride
programme.desc: A high school girl was forced to marry a college student by her grandfather. The effort to keep the marriage secret was soon challenged as her husband will be teaching in her school as an intern…

programme.title: On The Line
programme.desc: Voice phishing victim infiltrates into the organisation's call center to recover the money, yet discovered another large scale scam ahead...

programme.title: Gonjiam: Haunted Asylum
programme.desc: A handful of people are recruited to live stream a horror show at Gonjiam, Korea's most haunted hospital. To attract more viewers, scares are set up along the way, but soon things take a darker turn.

programme.title: Hot Blooded
programme.desc: A small and quiet port in Busan outskirt became the battlefield of local gangsters.

programme.desc: A team of experts were put together to drill into Korea’s oil pipeline and steal petroleum, but the plan takes a turn as the group begin to deceive one another…

programme.title: Tour With Classics Season 2 Ep8
programme.desc: The program helps to explore humanistic perception and tourism experience via outdoor visit and leads the audience to experience the beautiful scenery, spread humanities, review history, re-visit classics by feeling the soul of cultural spirit.

programme.desc: A reality show combined with AI image Captain.S virtual scene presentation to achieve a more diversified screen content. programme.title: Strawberryman Ep9

programme.title: The Delicacy Ep9
programme.desc: Representatives in various fields are invited to submit creative recipes; top chefs fight for the interesting one and cook accordingly. Allen Lin, Meng Mei Qi, and David Wang gather as the judges to select and add the outstanding dishes in to the menu of winners.

programme.title: Perfect Match (2017) Ep7
programme.desc: The brand new version of "Perfect Match", 24 female guests will be divided into think about zone and observation zone. The male guests will not show their appearance at that moment. They will have conversation with the female guests through the "second scene". All guests by two-way choice get to decide if they are the right persons to couple up.

programme.title: The Lucky 2% Ep8
programme.desc: This is the first reality show about helping and rescuing the strays. Guests from different fields are invited to become volunteers in the animal welfare center, to provide the stray animals with treatment and love, and finally find suitable adopters for them.

programme.title: All Reviving Ep5
programme.desc: A documentary cultural program focuses on intangible cultural heritage. Yang Lan, the Chinese media proprietor & journalist, brings us to visit the inheritors of 11 intangible cultural heritage skills with cultural successors, discovers the essence of Chinese excellent traditional culture.

programme.title: New Chinese Dating Event Season 2 Ep12
programme.desc: A blind date program hosted by Meng Fei. Participants will join a blind date with their parents, to explore the topics of love and marriage. The difference of value of marriage between two generations will be shown.

programme.desc: Go Fighting! is a game-variety-reality show, Gong Jun, Wowkie Zhang, Yun-peng Yue, Justin Huang, Yan Hoaxing, Johnny Huang and Jia Nailiang formed as “challenging team” to complete missions with an open-ended outdoor project at a landmark to win the objective.

The guests include Dicky Cheung, Kenny Chung, Christopher Wong, and Warren Mok.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep447
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Young Days No Fears(M) Ep3435
programme.desc: The six girls, as good friends, have gone through their difficulties and crises in relationship, at work, and in their marriage together. Despite many challenges in life, they are not afraid. They have got each other’s back.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep961
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep831832
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep670
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3372
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46184619
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep10831084
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1813
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-Monday (M)(repeat) Ep8
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2037
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-Moving Kitchen (M)(repeat) Ep3
programme.desc: Tuesday "iWalker" has been upgraded and changed the name into "iWalker-Moving Kitchen". James and the pretty chef, Rachel will move to different province with the mobile kitchen which costs more than 2 million NTD, and introduce to the audience the unique taste of the province.

programme.title: House of Flying Daggers
programme.desc: During Tang Dynasty, two police deputies are tasked to catch the new leader of a revolutionary faction known as the House of Flying Daggers. They capture a blind dancer suspected of being the daughter of the ex-leader but both fall in love with her. When passion turns into hatred and loyalty turns into betrayal, love will be the deadliest weapon!

programme.title: Fallen Angels
programme.desc: The funkier cousin to Chungking Express, director Wong Kar Wai looks at five fallen angels who suffer love and loss amidst the crime and chaos of Hong Kong’s neon nights. Karen Mok won Best Supporting Actress in the 15th Hong Kong Film Awards for her remarkable role as a broken-hearted party girl.

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling dreams of becoming a secret agent. Even though it seems impossible, she still harbours such a dream and hopes that it will soon come true. One day, Miu Ling rescues an injured secret agent who promises to make her his apprentice. From then on, her life is turned upside down and she goes onto a roller-coaster of madcap adventures.

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb…

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: The New Big Boss
programme.desc: A young man seeks out the Wolf, a legendary undefeated warrior. When he sees that the Wolf is now an old man, he prompts him to retell his past glories.

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: Encroach
programme.desc: University freshman Zhen Xin finds her classmates, except You Mei, very unfriendly to her, and the two quickly became good friends. Zhen Xin lives in the dormitory and constantly hears strange noises. When she was attacked by a man in black, You Mei saved her and the latter’s identity is also revealed.

programme.title: Undiscovered Tomb
programme.desc: On the remote border between China and India, adventurer Ivy scours the land in search of the undiscovered tomb rumored to house the long-lost Pills of Eternity. However, she is not the only one searching for these powerful pills.

programme.title: Lucky Star 2015
programme.desc: When a talent manager meets a guy whose voice resembles the famous comedian Stephen Chow, things starts to stir up in the show biz. "Lucky Star 2015" is a hilarious comedy starring actors from both Hong Kong and Taiwan, including Eric Tsang, Dada Chan and Wong Cho Lam.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: Running On Karma
programme.desc: Andy Lau is a monk turned body-builder, with the gift of foreseeing people's lives. He befriends a female cop (Cecilia Cheung) and uses his gift to change the force of Karma and her destiny. The movie is ultimately a Buddhist parable about the nature of karma.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs II
programme.desc: This silver screen epic, a prequel to Infernal Affairs, hit the astonishing $16.8 million box office mark one week after its premiere. The second installment of the Infernal Affairs trilogy brings audiences with ultimate suspense and high quality action scenes! Turning into a Chinese version of the popular Godfather series, Infernal Affairs II offers its viewers an even tighter plot with a brilliant cast led by Edison Chen, Shawn Yue, Carina Lau, Eric Tsang, Anthony Wong, and Francis Ng to supply top entertainment that has rarely been seen in modern Hong Kong cinema. A legend is born at the best of times. From the multiple award-winning team behind the mind-blowing blockbuster, the secrets are finally revealed in this most anticipating prequel: What drove police superintendent Wong (Anthony Wong) and crime boss Sam (Eric Tsang) against one another? How did two struggling moles Yan (Shawn Yue) and Ming (Edison Chen) begin their parallel fates? The keys lie in the hands of three: Sam's wife Mary (Carina Lau), ruthless kingpin Hau (Francis Ng), and righteous cop Luk (Hu Jun). The infernal gates are open to the worst of times...

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Chang’s first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunt’s puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Legendary Amazons
programme.desc: Produced by Jackie Chan, this is the story about the fabled Yang family of female generals in feudal China. Yang Zong Bao, the last man standing in the Yang family, dies in a battle when defending the Song Dynasty from invaders. Zong Bao’s wife Mu Gui Ying steps up to lead other widows of the Yang’s into battle to continue their husband’s legacy.

programme.title: The Way We Are
programme.desc: Set in Tin Shui Wai, a marginalised satellite town, Kwai is a middle-aged widow who works hard in a neighbourhood supermarket to support herself and her son. They lead a mundane but fulfilling life. When an elderly woman who lives alone moved in to Tin Shui Wai, Kwai strikes up a friendship with her and helps her ease into a new life.

programme.title: The Eagle Shooting Heroes
programme.desc: Executive produced by Wong Kar Wai, “The Eagle Shooting Heroes” is loosely based on Louis Cha’s classics. Whilst mistaken identity and rampant gender confusion are on the menu, Sammo Hung’s action direction and the incredible all-star casts also keep the laughs and thrills coming in this Hong Kong-style crazy comedy.

programme.title: Still Human
programme.desc: Evelyn, a Filipino domestic helper, moves to Hong Kong to work for Cheong Wing, a divorcee paralyzed in a construction accident. Becoming unlikely friends, the two discover shared humanity that helps them face life’s mounting hardships.

programme.title: Shaolin Kung Fu Kids
programme.desc: Bo is separated from other Shaolin disciples when they are on the way to perform. He meets a family from Hong Kong and gets help from them. When this family faces difficulties, Bo uses his kung fu to help them solve those problems.

programme.title: The Empty Hands
programme.desc: Mari Hirakawa inherits her father’s dojo after his death but wants to sell it as she does not want to run the karate practice. For her plan to succeed, she has to take on a bet with his father’s ex-student and compete in a martial arts competition that will change her life.

programme.title: Queen of Triads
programme.desc: An innocent young girl named Zuo Lan attempts to commit suicide after she was betrayed by her boyfriend. However, she is saved by a gangster boss called Zui Ge. In order to exact her revenge, Zuo Lan joins force with Zui Ge and becomes a top mobster…

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: A Hong Kong police inspector, Lin Dong, had to protect an important witness in his mission thirteen years ago. This not only forced him to be separated from his daughter, but also got him involved in a conspiracy spanning more than a decade.

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 2011
programme.desc: Popular make-up artist Sammy is hired as the CEO of a cosmetics company with all women staff. As he is clueless with women, he invites Arnold, a fellow make-up artist, to join and help him. Though Arnold might appear to be a woman's magnet, his heart still lingers with his first love, Mona.

programme.title: Legend of the Demon Cat
programme.desc: Adapted from a Japanese fantasy novel, a demon cat appears and breaks the peace of Chang'an city, causing a series of mysterious events. A poet and a Japanese monk band together to follow the trails left by the cat, leading them to discover a buried secret.

programme.title: Echoes of the Rainbow
programme.desc: Set in Hong Kong in the 1960s, the story revolves around the family of a hardworking shoemaker Mr Law, with his happy-go-lucky wife and two sons – a talented elder son and an eight-year-old eccentric younger son. While their lives are not always smooth-sailing, the family sticks together and support one another through thick and thin.

programme.title: Hello Mr. Billionaire
programme.desc: An incompetent soccer goalkeeper for a minor league suddenly inherits thirty billion yuan in this mind-boggling comedy. In order to get the full amount, he must first spend one billion yuan on himself in a month without telling anyone about the task, and is also not allowed to own any assets at the end of it.

programme.title: Needing You
programme.desc: Office politics and love between co-workers complicates the lives of two computer-company employees in this romantic comedy starring Andy Lau and Sammi Cheng.

programme.title: Defying Chase
programme.desc: A stunt man is inadvertently caught in a criminal operation involving culture relics hustling, and has to fight for himself in a series of dangerous adventures.

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Xiao Ru’s financial analysis for a bank client was stolen online. A ransom has to be paid within three days or else the document would be disclosed. To protect the client’s data, the company brings in the police to investigate. In the meantime, an analyst disappears and the Technical Director resigns. Is there a bigger crisis lurking behind?

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the “Gang of Five” in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: The Bully
programme.desc: For lovers of the Shaw's sumptuous production and martial arts expertise, this action adventure in the "Jackie Chan style" is a special treat. A persecuted waiter turns to a "drunken master" for help when a restaurant customer turns out to be a kung-fu harbinger of doom!

programme.title: River of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husband’s death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: The Brave Archer
programme.desc: On his way back to the midlands, Guo Jing meets Huang Rong and they quickly fall in love. However, Ouyang Ke proposes to marry Huang Rong at the same time, so Huang’s father sets up a duel for the two men to compete for her hand. Guo Jing finally beats Ouyang Ke to win Huang Rong back.

programme.title: Big Times for the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: Ah Niu finds a bag of jewels on the street and becomes rich. It is at this time that Uncle Zhou asks him to sign a contract to marry a girl, but it turns out to be a trap for Ah Niu to sell his house. In the end, Ah Niu becomes poor again…

programme.title: Shaolin Martial Arts
programme.desc: The Qing government assigns fighters to destroy Shaolin Temple and kill all the disciples, but two of them successfully escaped. They train under different masters and learn the Wing Chun and Hung Quan styles respectively, finally killing the fighters and taking revenge for the death of their fellow disciples.

programme.title: Return of the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: The Eight Diagram Pole Fighter
programme.desc: A heroic family is double crossed and massacred on the battle field with only two of the brothers surviving the slaughter. One of the brothers (Gordon Liu), escapes to a Shaolin temple where his bloodlust and thirst for vengeance puts him at odds with the monks. When he discovers his sister is captured by the same villains who destroyed his family he leaves the monastery in an attempt to rescue her and avenge what has come upon his family.

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu-lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun-yang.

programme.title: Heads For Sale
programme.desc: Hua is an upright and brave swordswoman who will stand up against villains and do anything for Luo, the man she loves. When Luo is sent to jail by the corrupted police, she sets out to free him and did not hesitate to chop off two bodyguards’ heads. In the process, she also stumbles across an old enemy of her father who is back seeking revenge.

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keeper’s daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: A Deadly Secret
programme.desc: A corrupt magistrate, obsessed with finding a hidden treasure, jails and tortures his daughter's lover and buries his daughter alive! Ironically, it is in her coffin that the secret to the hidden treasure is found, setting off a frenzy of destruction.

programme.title: Little Dragon Maiden
programme.desc: With Hong Kong cinema's new wave, high flying, martial arts action of the 1980's, came a new wave of actors; teeny-bopper, canto-pop singer/stars with little or no martial arts background. However, when a film like LITTLE DRAGON MAIDEN intelligently mixes the old with the new, the results are pure golden magic. This costume-action, drama, love story features relative newcomer Leslie Cheung, who falls in love with the Dragon Maiden while learning the art of swordplay. The recipe is complete when veteran kung-fu stars Chen Kuan-tai and Lo Lieh add just enough weapon-wielding spice to make this film really cook. Cheung garnered international recognition in John Woo's A BETTER TOMORROW and Ronny Yu's THE BRIDE WITH WHITE HAIR.

programme.title: The Enchanting Ghost
programme.desc: It is love beyond the grave, as a young scholar and his beautiful lover are torn apart forever by his dastardly uncle and his friend, who drive the girl to commit suicide... but with death comes revenge for the enchanting ghost. A spooky yet heart-wrenching tale...

programme.title: The Imperial Swordsman
programme.desc: Fu is a government officer heading home after being charged with falsifying reports. En route, he encounters & recruits a skilled swordsman as a bodyguard. They then meet a fleeing bride and her maid who asked to join them for protection. When the group reach a ruined temple however, a gang of assassins appear and attack them…

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: The Avenging Eagle
programme.desc: Chik, one of the assassins of the Iron Boat Clan, decides to leave the clan when a kind family saved him. When pursued by the clan, a swordsman whose wife was killed by him saved his life. They decide to jointly take revenge on the clan.

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers’ claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: Five Tough Guys
programme.desc: A titular gang of misfits come together to protect a patriotic general from a scheming usurper. To this end, the unlikely heroes act as the general’s escorts on a dangerous journey to a distant British consulate, beset by enemies and sinister Japanese interference along the way.

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows.

programme.title: The Supreme Swordsman
programme.desc: After beating several famous swordsmen, Chin Wu-hsin (Pai Piao) of the Mo Shan clan challenges Supreme Swordsman (Wang Jung) to a duel, hoping to win his title, and is beaten and humiliated. The winner taunts him to find a Supreme Sword made by Old Eagle, a famous sword-maker (Ku Feng). When his offer to buy a sword from Old Eagle, is turned down, he challenges Old Eagle to a duel, and snatches his sword in a foul play. Old Eagle's own son Shih Yen-peh (Derek Yee) vows to avenge for his father...

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: Men From The Gutter
programme.desc: Two very different cops are out to capture a local drug boss. In this sizzling crime thriller, the two cops go about doing their jobs differently - one does everything to the letter of the law and the other just doing whatever it takes to solve crime.

programme.title: Call of the Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yu’s beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: Portrait In Crystal
programme.desc: Tragic deaths in the underworld cause leader "Yama" (Teng Wei-hao) to suspect a portrait in crystal with mysterious powers. He sends Hen Pan (Chen Hung) and Pai Pan (Hung Hsin-nan) to interrogate its creator, martial artist Lung Fei (Pai Piao)...

programme.title: Operation Lipstick
programme.desc: A professor’s assistant stole a micro-film storing the secret of a newly invented nuclear reactor and sells it to a crime syndicate. However, the micro-film accidentally falls into the hands of a nightclub dancer and a thief in the process, leading to them being relentlessly pursued by the crime syndicate to retrieve the micro-film.

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Fashion designer Shi asks his friend Mui to comment on his new design but is angered by her criticism. When Mui asks him to design a gown for her to attend a gala event, Shi takes revenge by making a clown costume instead. Seeing Mui’s embarrassment, Shi feels guilty and apologizes to her, before they fall in love…

programme.title: The Hidden Power Of Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: Defeated villain Sung Ching Shu returns and starts a reign of terror, trapping a beautiful Mongolian Princess and mastering the "yin and yang combination" to become almost invincible. Only two swords held by two great swordsmen can stand in his way!

programme.title: Whose Baby is in the Classroom?
programme.desc: Chen, a male teacher in an all girls’ high school, is stuck with a baby that isn’t his and must take care of it. As he lives on the school grounds, the baby is a source of constant distraction and worry! Luckily, his class warms to the baby and helps him take care of it while he works his charm on Li Ching, an uptight teacher in the same school.

programme.title: The Dragon Creek
programme.desc: This wuxia murder mystery film talks about a young girl whose father was ruthlessly murdered during China's early republican era. She has a list of villains who have been plotting against her father and together with her elder brother, the young girl sets out on a journey to hunt down the secret serial killer.

programme.title: Tales of Larceny
programme.desc: Connecting all the antics of bosses, monks, beggars, and thieves is the slippery and sinuous efforts of three pickpockets so adept at their chosen skill that they can even trick three beauties of their underwear without missing a step.

programme.title: The Singing Killer
programme.desc: Chiang Yi is blackmailed into a jewelry heist by his former boss, who threatens to expose his shady past. Complications arise when he discovers his first love works at the store.

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: The Kid With A Tattoo
programme.desc: Young Bao Tong witnesses the brutal murder of his kung fu master by a vicious villain. A large eagle tattoo on Bao’s chest was spotted by the killer as he escapes. Can Bao escape from the killer?

programme.title: The Voyage of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not Hate
programme.desc: Simone is an established surgeon and son of a holocaust survivor. After refusing to save a victim of a traffic accident with a swastika tattoo, he must grapple with the guilt he feels from his decision.

programme.title: Paper Boats
programme.desc: Hearing the news that his estranged daughter in America faces deportation, a man who has lost it all recovers the will to live after agreeing to take in her children. This is a timely and stirring tale about immigrant kinship and hardship in foreign land.

programme.title: Love In Mauritius
programme.desc: 44 year-old Doria finds out her husband is cheating on her, her daughter despises her, and her job bores her. She travels to Mauritius on her mother’s invitation, and meets Theo, a man twenty years younger than her, and one who will change her life.

programme.title: The Human Part
programme.desc: While telling his parents and two sisters that he is a successful CEO of a large IT company, Pekka is actually bankrupt and penniless. He cons strangers for money and food. What happens when his parents show up for a surprise visit?

programme.title: Oddball
programme.desc: An eccentric chicken farmer, with the help of his granddaughter, trains his mischievous dog Oddball to protect a penguin sanctuary from fox attacks in an attempt to reunite his family and save their seaside town.

programme.title: The Daddy Offensive
programme.desc: Markus, who has always wanted a family, is overjoyed when his holiday fling Lena becomes pregnant. Her father strongly disapproves of him and when he turns up for his birthday, a hilarious showdown ensues between Markus and his future father-in-law.

programme.title: When Night Falls
programme.desc: Azlan, a 16 year-old dressmaker, falls for a customer at his aunt’s dressmaking shop. She becomes a frequent fixture in Azlan’s life as a regular customer, and their relationship grows closer. However, everything changes when he finds out her secret...

programme.title: I Was, I Am, I Will Be
programme.desc: Baran, a Kurdish gigolo seeking a better life in Europe meets Marion, a German pilot struggling with her cancer diagnosis. Entering into what was initially a sham marriage, the pair's relationship develops into something deeper.

programme.title: Playmaker
programme.desc: A former footballer and jailbird, Ivo is no longer interested in football. That is until he meets Lukas, a talented young player, and decides to help him pursue a professional career. But his criminal past soon catches up with him.

programme.title: Penny Bank
programme.desc: Middle aged Orhan is struggling with every aspect of his life: he has to take care of his comatose mother, he is in debt, he cannot fulfill his role as a father, and he has to juggle multiple jobs. Eventually, he has to make an impossible decision…

programme.desc: Rolf digs for new DNA material in a bid to uncover more details about the two girls’ disappearances. However, the results of the investigation by Vidt, the officer who took over the case from Rolf, has mysteriously vanished.

programme.title: Going In Style (2017)
programme.desc: Oscar winners Morgan Freeman, Michael Caine and Alan Arkin team up as lifelong buddies Willie, Joe and Al, who decide to buck retirement and step off the straight-and-narrow for the first time in their lives when their pension fund becomes a corporate casualty, in director Zach Braff's comedy Going In Style. Desperate to pay the bills and come through for their loved ones, the three risk it all by embarking on a daring bid to knock off the very bank that absconded with their money.

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: As a young boy, Bruce Wayne watched in horror as his millionaire parents were slain in front of him – a trauma that leads him to become obsessed with revenge. But the opportunity to avenge his parents' deaths is cruelly taken away from him by fate. Fleeing to the East, where he seeks counsel with the dangerous but honorable ninja cult leader known as Ra's Al-Ghul, Bruce returns to his now decaying Gotham City, which is overrun by organized crime and other dangerous individuals manipulating the system. Meanwhile, Bruce is slowly being swindled out of Wayne Industries, the company he inherited. The discovery of a cave under his mansion, along with a prototype armored suit, leads him to assume a new persona, one which will strike fear into the hearts of men who do wrong; he becomes Batman!!!

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: Based on the first volume in Philip Pullman's best-selling, award-winning trilogy, His Dark Materials, THE GOLDEN COMPASS unfolds an epic fantasy adventure set in a parallel world, where science and magic intertwine.Twelve-year-old Lyra Belacqua (played by newcomer Dakota Blue Richards) sets out to rescue her best friend, and ends up on an extraordinary quest to save not only her own world, but ours and others as well. Academy Award winner Nicole Kidman and stars with Daniel Craig in this triumph of the imagination. Filled with fascination, depth and wonder, Pullman's saga presents the eternal struggle of good vs. evil -- and the power of one young girl heal a rift torn in the fabric of the universe.

programme.desc: Four nice, but petty criminals find themselves heavily in debt to a murderous London gangster after a crooked card game. To cover their debts and literally save their skins, they decide to rob a bunch of thugs who have just robbed a group of pot growers.

programme.title: Sliver
programme.desc: A literary agent's life seems to take a turn for the better when she moves into a new apartment and develops a romance but as the history of the building and its occupants unfolds, she is plunged into a terrifying nightmare of high-tech voyeurism and murder.

programme.title: The Next Three Days
programme.desc: Russell Crowe stars as a family man with an ideal life who finds his world turned upside down when his wife is convicted of murdering her boss. Convinced of her innocence he decides to break her out of prison, but soon finds himself out of his depth.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: An enormous beast goes on a worldwide destructive rampage and is headed toward New York City.

programme.title: The Devil You Know
programme.desc: Once-incarcerated Marcus Cowans is trying to turn over a new leaf with the support of his loving family. Upon discovering that one of his brothers may have been involved in a horrific crime, Marcus grapples with the limits of brotherhood and loyalty.

programme.title: Mommy Would Never Hurt You
programme.desc: Riley wants to rebuild her estranged relationship with her mother and little sister who is ill. But when Riley realizes her sister may not actually be as sick as she appears, Riley's mother stops at nothing to keep her daughters with her forever.

programme.title: Flatliners
programme.desc: A group of medical students are about to die . . . and live to tell about it.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into The Spider-Verse
programme.desc: Enter a universe where more than one wears the mask.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into The Spider-Verse

programme.title: The Contractor
programme.desc: James Dial, once a top CIA assassin and now retired, is called back by the CIA to kill a terrorist leader in London. But Dial learns that once his mission is accomplished, he will be next on the hit list, to remove any traces of American involvement.

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Tom Hanks reprises his role as Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon, who once again finds that forces with ancient roots are willing to stop at nothing, even murder, to advance their goals.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: An enormous beast goes on a worldwide destructive rampage and is headed toward New York City.

programme.title: Liberty Stands Still
programme.desc: Liberty, the wife of a gun manufacturer, is taken hostage by a man named Joe. Joe explains that his daughter died in a high school shooting and he plans to avenge himself upon the people responsible for manufacturing the firearm used to kill her.

programme.title: Life Below Zero (S10) Ep14
programme.desc: The Burden of Possessions - With temperatures on the rise, Alaskans must ensure their survival in the hostile Arctic.

programme.title: The Hunt (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: Living with Predators - It's hard to imagine a world without lions, tigers and polar bears. But the earth's wildest places are shrinking, and people are coming into deadly conflict with these ancient carnivores.

programme.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Fitness Tracker - Hannah Fry finds out how 1970s car crashes helped us to count our steps, why WWII dog-fights led to a crucial health monitor and how fitness trackers are even being used to catch killers.

programme.title: The Age of Nature (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Understanding - How the study of ecosystems across the world giving us a deeper understanding of nature. We hear about a decline in orca numbers and how invasive plants contributed to Cape Town's 2018 drought.

programme.title: Lion: The Rise and Fall of the Marsh Pride (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: The story of the Marsh Pride continues with testimony from those who filmed them, those who tried to protect them and those who hunted them. The Maasai, who live and graze their cattle next door to the pride speak about the struggles of living close to these dangerous predators.

programme.title: Food Factory (S5) Ep22
programme.desc: A squad of Ohio taco artists is determined to win an annual food truck competition.

programme.title: The Age of Nature (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Changing - This episode explores the study of changing ecosystems across the world giving us a deeper understanding of nature. We hear about how we can work with nature to store carbon and the importance of protecting forest and the reefs.

programme.title: Australia with Simon Reeve (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Simon discovers why millions of tourists flock to the Gold Coast - which has now become the crime capital of Australia.

programme.title: First Contact: An Alien Encounter (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Part 2. Combining drama and documentary we imagine what might happen when humans detect the first indisputable evidence of extra-terrestrial civilisation.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Canada - It's deep into the Canadian wilderness for this week's challenge: searching for the White Sturgeon, the biggest freshwater fish in North America.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep5
programme.desc: September-October - a Time of Activation - Travel around the world to see another seasonal change unfold. The Northern Hemisphere moves into autumn, while Australia witnesses a rebirth of life, and mating humpbacks fill the warming tropical seas of Tonga.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep6
programme.desc: November-December - Full Circle - Witness some of the most incredible natural events in November, from the millions of Monarch butterflies that converge in Mexico’s forests to the deep fog that shrouds the city of Dubai, signalling the start of winter.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Chico the Baby Capuchin - In Brazil’s Serra da Capivara, Chico, the baby capuchin monkey is learning to integrate into a troop with complicated rules, and exploring a forest full of excitement and danger. But mastering the art of tool use holds the key to his survival.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Ravi the Baby Lion Tailed Macaque - In India, Ravi the baby lion-tailed macaque faces life in a shrinking habitat and encroaching human world. Luckily he has a caring mum, a protective dad, a playful sister, and numerous, cousins, aunts and uncles all watching over him.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Weird, Wild & Wonderful - Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep13
programme.desc: Deer - In Hampton, New Brunswick the deer population is running wild. In the summer locals struggle to maintain their crops from growing fawns and hungry does. Sightings have reached an all time high and residents fear the overpopulation may be at its tipping point.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Outcasts - In the Luangwa Valley lies a grove of Ebony trees, home to a troop of baboons. But, there are dangers here – the resident leopard who, unlike the other predators, is powerful and agile enough to climb trees. He’s not an easy foe to elude.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Living on the Edge - The plains and woodlands of the Luangwa Valley are the wildest and most merciless of all neighborhoods where duels between predator and prey are played out both day and night. For the animals that call this home, it’s a daily battle to stay alive.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep4
programme.desc: July-August - a Time of Migration - Witness some of the planet’s most dramatic natural shifts in July, from the Arctic ice sheets that come crashing down during the summer melt to the feeding frenzy when sockeye salmon reach the end of their journey in Alaska.

programme.desc: September-October - a Time of Activation - Travel around the world to see another seasonal change unfold. The Northern Hemisphere moves into autumn, while Australia witnesses a rebirth of life, and mating humpbacks fill the warming tropical seas of Tonga.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Vanishing Wilderness - Kenya's growing human population is taking land and resources away from wildlife. The squeeze is creating increasing numbers of conflicts between humans and animals, and is one of the biggest issues in African conservation.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep14
programme.desc: Whales - Brier Island is at the western point of the Bay of Fundy in Nova Scotia. And in the surrounding waters live an incredible number of humpback whales and dolphins. On still waters, Humpbacks smash their tails, flap their fins, and breach one en masse. It’s an incredible sight. A pod of dolphins swims into the Bay of Fundy, feeding off herring. They’re soon joined by an Orca that capitalizes on their feeding strategies.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Madagascar - Madagascar is home to strange animals not found anywhere else on Earth. When these animals fight for supremacy, their battles are just as strange - from weird neck-wrestling weevils to ring-tailed lemur moms that go into battle with baby on board.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Australia - Australia is home to an eclectic array of creatures, and the ways to succeed as an alpha are just as diverse. The beach turns into a dueling ground, and the outback becomes a boxing ring, as animals face off with their own kind.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Bound By Blood - Dry season in Zambia means new life for the Nsefu pride of lions along the Luangwa River. From their first day on earth to the playful days of youth, see how new cubs rely on the strong bond of the entire pride for their survival.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Bird Paradise - Every year, the southern wetlands of the Pantanal become a bird paradise as over 650 species of rare and iconic birds congregate here for the breeding season.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 Ep5
programme.desc: The Valley of the Birds - Zambia’s Luangwa Valley is home to Africa’s biggest and most fearsome giants, but what really makes it special are its birds. There are over 400 different species here; each perfectly adapted to exploit every opportunity on offer.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep5
programme.desc: September-October - a Time of Activation - Travel around the world to see another seasonal change unfold. The Northern Hemisphere moves into autumn, while Australia witnesses a rebirth of life, and mating humpbacks fill the warming tropical seas of Tonga.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Queen of the Bay - Chase Anna to the Townies’ lair, where Mia and her newborn pups are hiding out. See the babies’ first swimming lessons before the clan moves to new digs, and welcome an era of otter peace as the Mangrove Family becomes a park’s main attraction.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Ultimate Predator - Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its prey’s heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 Ep5
programme.desc: The Valley of the Birds - Zambia’s Luangwa Valley is home to Africa’s biggest and most fearsome giants, but what really makes it special are its birds. There are over 400 different species here; each perfectly adapted to exploit every opportunity on offer.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Migration - Epic flights, adventurous sea journeys and exhausting road trips all play a key part in the lives of many species. These empires travel in search of food, shelter or a mate. But booking and organizing travel is no easy feat when those plans involve hundreds – even thousands – of individuals.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Lemurs of Anja Mountain - Millions of years ago, castaway creatures found themselves stranded on Madagascar’s rugged shores. Isolated from the mainland, the newcomers were left to evolve. This is a magical world of rare and unique creatures perfectly adapted to their tropical hideaway.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Madagascar - Madagascar is home to strange animals not found anywhere else on Earth. When these animals fight for supremacy, their battles are just as strange - from weird neck-wrestling weevils to ring-tailed lemur moms that go into battle with baby on board.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Bound By Blood - Dry season in Zambia means new life for the Nsefu pride of lions along the Luangwa River. From their first day on earth to the playful days of youth, see how new cubs rely on the strong bond of the entire pride for their survival.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Australia - Australia is home to an eclectic array of creatures, and the ways to succeed as an alpha are just as diverse. The beach turns into a dueling ground, and the outback becomes a boxing ring, as animals face off with their own kind.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep6

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Savanna - The African savanna is an epic landscape, and whether it’s head-bashing hippos, hormone-crazed elephants or dueling lions, battles that rage on the savanna are just as epic.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep4
programme.desc: India - Welcome to India – a land of exotic animals and exotic warfare. Monkeys stage dusty dust-ups, blackbucks wage open war on the open plains, and peacock dandies swing switchblades: these are colorful battles worthy of a vibrant land.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Misfits - In an extraordinary story of love and betrayal, a young lion cub is cast out from the pride for being the runt of the litter. To survive, he must conquer overwhelming hardships. In this part of Zambia, that is no easy feat.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Peccary Party - In the heart of the Pantanal wetlands, there’s a region so remote very few humans ever get there.The lack of human interaction makes this the perfect habitat for a thunderous herd of three hundred white-lipped peccaries. These large pig-like mammals grow up to forty five kilos and have stripes of white hair underneath their chin which gives them their distinctive appearance and name.

programme.title: Woodpeckers: The Hole Story 1 Ep1
programme.desc: March to the steady drumbeat of a unique avian family. Learn why the world’s 239 woodpecker species, from massive to minute, are nature’s best lumberjacks; explore their flying, climbing, and calling skills; and get a look inside their secret nests.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep6
programme.desc: November-December - Full Circle - Witness some of the most incredible natural events in November, from the millions of Monarch butterflies that converge in Mexico’s forests to the deep fog that shrouds the city of Dubai, signalling the start of winter.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Migration - Epic flights, adventurous sea journeys and exhausting road trips all play a key part in the lives of many species. programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep6
programme.desc: November-December - Full Circle - Witness some of the most incredible natural events in November, from the millions of Monarch butterflies that converge in Mexico’s forests to the deep fog that shrouds the city of Dubai, signalling the start of winter.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Etosha: the Great White Place - Etosha was once a great lake that dried up and now only fills with water seasonally during the summer rains. Once the Etosha pan is full of water, a myriad of water birds congregate in the shallow lake to breed, most notably Greater and lesser flamingos.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Linear Oasis - Follow the course of South Africa’s Orange river from its origins to where it spills out into the Atlantic Ocean. Along the way we encounter a diverse range of habitats and the creatures they support, from the dry lands of the Richtersveld to the beauty of Augrabies; this is the story of the Linear Oasis. We reveal how life is adapted to survive along its course and discover a rich world of plants and animals.

programme.desc: Pub and Butcher's Shop, Framlingham - Paul and Imogen snap up a pub and butcher's shop, with ambitious plans to restore the Grade II listed building and add a modern glass extension. But there are long delays and eye-watering costs.

programme.desc: MGM Cotai, Macau - Monica and Giles travel to the self-governing Chinese city of Macau to explore behind the scenes of one of its newest and most high-tech hotels.

programme.title: George Clarke's Remarkable Renovations (S2) Ep1
programme.desc: Pub and Butcher's Shop, Framlingham - Paul and Imogen snap up a pub and butcher's shop, with ambitious plans to restore the Grade II listed building and add a modern glass extension. But there are long delays and eye-watering costs.

programme.title: Jamie: Together at Christmas (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Christmas Party - Jamie kicks off this two-part special with a Christmas party to remember. Jamie creates a sublime festive party menu of beef bourguignon and a winter bombe pud.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off (S11) Ep7
programme.desc: 1980s Week - The bakers tackle a quiche, a retro technical and an ice cream showstopper.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (S3) Ep2
programme.desc: The Torridon, Scotland - Monica Galetti and Giles Coren visit the Scottish Highlands to spend some time working at The Torridon, Britain's most northerly five-star hotel with a balance of luxury with self-sufficiency.

programme.title: Donal's Asian Baking Adventure (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Singapore 2 - Like most grand hotels in Asia, The Regent Hotel serves fancy cream teas - a remnant of Singapore's colonial past. Donal learns how the Executive Head Chef has modernised the offering and won Gold for Singapore at the Culinary Olympics last year.

programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat (S2) Ep5
programme.desc: New Forest - Chris Bavin takes Fred to the New Forest, where fresh local produce is king. Featuring wood-fired cooking, pork pies and a country pub serving the perfect Ploughman's.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off (S11) Ep8
programme.desc: Dessert Week - The signature round features a miniature cheesecake, while the technical challenge features a dish that dates back to the 17th century. Finally, for their showstoppers, the bakers must concoct a jelly art dessert cake constructed of delicate sponge.

programme.title: Grand Designs (S20) Ep11
programme.desc: Two decades on, has Sue and Martin's ancient barn renovation finally come to fruition?
