programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep27
programme.desc: O Captain, My Captain Part 1 - Prince Barty and Princess Julienne, King Julien's needy and dramatic parents, must take over for their son when he's held captive on a pirate ship

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep28
programme.desc: O Captain, My Captain Part 2 - As Mort and Clover search for their leader, King Julien shows off his pirate booty moves and convinces the pirates he should be captain of the ship.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep3
programme.desc: Clubbing - Homesick, Cleo tries joining some school clubs to feel better. Her homesickness has an unexpected and destructive effect.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep4
programme.desc: Humility - Cleo’s over confidence gets her friends captured, and to rescue them she must convince a tribe of laidback aliens she can master their high values of humility, serenity, and caution.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep27
programme.desc: Lucky and La Voltereta Feroz - While Lucky and Spirit struggle to find their place In the circus, Pru and Abigail set out across the frontier to track down their runaway friend

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep28
programme.desc: Lucky and the No-Good Outlaw Butch Lepray - Lucky gets into trouble when the circus picks up a stranded woman who isn't what she seems

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep15
programme.desc: It Crushes / Rebel Without A Paws - Eep gets struck with the crush curse when cute new guy, Kevin, comes to Ahhh! Valley. Her and Grug do everything they can to break the curse's hold/ Thunk starts to hang out with liyotes against Grug's wishes when he has a hard time fitting in with kids from school.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep49
programme.desc: Bunker Break-In/To Catch a Critter - When Branch loses to Poppy at Capture the Flag, he challenges her to break into his bunker and steal Gary, to prove her abilities. Poppy organizes a whacky heist with the help of the Snack Pack. /When Smidge accidentally loses some of the critters Milton cares for, she must try and retrieve them from Trolls Forest.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch - Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep25
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part I - In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep26
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part II - Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants’ brain and defeat the nanobots’ leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants’ brain cells to the rescue! And when it’s all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep19
programme.desc: The Zippleback Experience - After heroes Hiccup and Toothless save Barf and Belch's life, the grateful Zippleback tries to repay its life debt and abandons riders Ruff and Tuff

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep20
programme.desc: Snow Way Out - Determined to create a key to the Dragon Eye, Ryker heads to Glacier Island to find the dangerous Snow Wraith being protected by the Dragon Riders

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep23
programme.desc: Picture Perfect - Tim and Boss Baby want to bond with Dad by recreating a perfect "Dudes Weekend' camping trip, culminating in a photo opp, but everything seems to go wrong

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep24
programme.desc: Play It Again, Tim - When Tim is forced to take piano lessons, he actually enjoys them and Boss Baby realizes that Tim is being brainwashed by his piano teacher, slowly turning Tim into an old man

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep19
programme.desc: The Battle(s) of Gongmen Bay - Po and the Kids agree to escort a dirigible shipment of food to a drought-torn region of China. But Nu Hai has some suspicions about Shi Long, which she finds aren't far off when she discovers the dirigible is set to explode...with them on board!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep20
programme.desc: Gongmen City Hustle - Po and the Kids make it to Gongmen City in search of the contact they heard has some info on the dirigible crash. Meanwhile, Xiao, mourning the presumed death of her new panda friends, takes off into the woods and meets a new friend.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep49
programme.desc: Bunker Break-In/To Catch a Critter - When Branch loses to Poppy at Capture the Flag, he challenges her to break into his bunker and steal Gary, to prove her abilities. Poppy organizes a whacky heist with the help of the Snack Pack. /When Smidge accidentally loses some of the critters Milton cares for, she must try and retrieve them from Trolls Forest.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep14
programme.desc: Bumbleberry/Leaf's Still Cool - Rocksy discovers that Verry Berry is fascinated with bees, but when Berry innocently cosplays as a bee, she disappears into the hive and doesn't emerge. / After reuniting with an old friend, Leaf goes to great, unsafe lengths to prove that he's still a cool daredevil.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep49
programme.desc: Small Change - When Puss feels powerless against the threat of the Bloodwolf, the crew asks Callista to help find the mysterious location of the Obelisk of Night

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep7
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Costly Conundrum of the Calamitous Claylossus - George and Harold transform the school's mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep8
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Jarring Jerkiness of the Judge J.O.R.T.S - George and Harold transform their new Spanish teacher into a superhero after they feel guilty for pranking him, but their teacher loves it and gets carried away

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep19
programme.desc: The Zippleback Experience - After heroes Hiccup and Toothless save Barf and Belch's life, the grateful Zippleback tries to repay its life debt and abandons riders Ruff and Tuff

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep37
programme.desc: The Case Of The Pocket's Present - Fuse asks Noddy to take a present to the Pockets. But when Noddy arrives at the Treehouse, he discovers he's carrying an empty box. The present, whatever it was, has gone! Noddy must investigate: where is the Pockets' present? But how will he ever find it when he doesn't actually know what it is? It's going to take all his detecting skills to solve this one!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep38
programme.desc: The Case Of Fuse's New Game - When Fuse invites his friends to come for a playdate all they want to do is play his new computer game. But then suddenly the computer goes off. He soon discovers there's a power cut affecting the whole of Brickabuild. But who switched off the power? And why? Desperate to carry on with the game, Noddy decides to investigate: how can they play Fuse's new game?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep39
programme.desc: The Case of the Pirate's Treasure - Queen Sparklewings asks the Pirate Captain to do the first dance with her at the Queen's Dance. But when it's time to practise, the Captain can't come: someone's stolen their treasure! Noddy decides to help find the treasure so the Captain will still be able to dance. He needs to investigate: Who stole the Pirates' treasure?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep40
programme.desc: The Case Of The Empty Store - Clockwork Mouse leaves Carlton in charge of getting everything ready for the Builders' Parade. Carlton gratefully accepts Noddy's offer of help but doesn't want the Naughticorns helping too! But when Carlton goes to the Brickabuild Store for supplies, he's horrified to discover the store is empty. How will they get the parade ready now? And will Clockwork Mouse ever trust Carlton again? Noddy sets out to investigate: Who took all the stuff from the Brickabuild Store?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep37
programme.desc: The Monkey That Roared - Something strange is going on in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. Every time Raa Raa visits a friend there is a loud roar… and it wasn't him! Who could it be? Raa Raa sets off to find out

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep38
programme.desc: Something New - Raa Raa is looking for something new in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. He is so busy looking, he doesn't spot all the strange new things going on around him

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep39
programme.desc: Raa Raa's Big Book Of Noises - Topsy sets out to make her own book for story time, but everything goes wrong when Raa Raa decides to join her. Can he put things right in time?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep40
programme.desc: Doctor Raa Raa - Raa Raa is busy racing round the jungle in his emergency cubbybuggy coming to the rescue for every bump and scrape. But do all his friends really need medical treatment?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep37
programme.desc: High-Tech Overload - Big Chris has got a new gadget to monitor the cars. He puts it to the test, what could possibly go wrong?!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep38
programme.desc: Workshop Chaos - Big Chris is furious when Marsha tidies up his workshop - how's he supposed to work in these conditions? Luckily Flash saves helps out by messing it up again!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep39
programme.desc: Silver Hatch Shapes Up - Conrod is having an engine tune up at Silver Hatch. He boasts that his spoilers make him faster than all the other cars… who then want to be just as fast as their V8 hero…

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep40
programme.desc: Pit Stop Perils - Mr Carburettor is fed up with Roary and Maxi constantly bickering about who is the fastest car at Silver Hatch. He decrees that the pair will have a race, and whoever wins, is the fastest - no more arguing!

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep19
programme.desc: Ring My Bell / First Mate Casper - Ring My Bell When Casper encourages Quasi to go on strike from his thankless job as chore boy, Alder and Dash make Casper take his place. First Mate Casper When Cappy needs a first mate, Casper's the only one who's up to the challenge.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep20
programme.desc: Power Outage Part 1 + 2 - Power Outage – Part 1: A Powerful Foe When Scare School falls victim to the Baccora, Kibosh encourages the students to work together, setting booby-traps and building defences. Power Outage – Part 2: Razznik's Revenge Creature by creature, the evil entity, Baccora, robs Scare School of its powers and locks them into a magical cleptor.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep26
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part II - Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants’ brain and defeat the nanobots’ leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants’ brain cells to the rescue! And when it’s all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep27
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Worrisome Wedge of the Water Warmongers - Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep24
programme.desc: Play It Again, Tim - When Tim is forced to take piano lessons, he actually enjoys them and Boss Baby realizes that Tim is being brainwashed by his piano teacher, slowly turning Tim into an old man

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep25
programme.desc: Research & Developments - Turtleneck wants to crack the Stinkless Serum formula and makes it a competition, pitting worker babies against worker babies, stating that the first one to the Serum will be the new CEO!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep62
programme.desc: Dances With Dingoes - A laid-back, festival-loving dingo emerges from the portal and teaches the orphans to boogie, but Puss soon learns the dance instructor has secret intentions

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep36
programme.desc: Chummy Sparklestone / Giggleyum - When the Funtime Factory stops producing one of their frosting flavors, Poppy sets out to create a replacement. But is her new flavor, Giggleyum too delicious?/During a Troll mystery party, Cooper has the role of detective. But when the party is over, Detective Cooper – now “Chummy Sparklestone” – refuses to break character, and he’s causing problems around the village!

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep36
programme.desc: Get Off My Lawn - When King Julien thinks he's a crime victim, he buys the village self-defense scorpions from a shady dealer, leaving everyone armed and dangerous.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep10
programme.desc: Lucky And The Harvest Hunt - Lucky takes part in a secret Miradero tradition a nighttime scavenger hunt

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep36
programme.desc: Blue Moon Over Argentina - Odlulu takes the Guitar Key from Wizard Melodia in order to be the best guitar player in Buenos Aires. Only problem is that the Guitar Key is what Wizard Melodia plays the guitar to control the rising & setting of the blue moon every 2.5 years. Wally and Wenda head to Argentina to help Wizard Melodia get the Guitar Key back and put Buenos Aires back to normal.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep3
programme.desc: Old Dog, New Tricks \ Snoozie-Hullabaloozie - Tag chooses to pair up with her Grandpaw for the Barker Family Talent Show, and together, they search for their winning talent. \ Tag is surprised to learn that today is the Pawston Snoozie-a-Hullabaloozie. With everything shut down for the day, Tag and Scooch take the opportunity to play all over town, while trying not to wake up other dogs.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep4
programme.desc: Gopher it! / A Glamping We Will Go - When a pesky gopher gets in the way of Fawna making her famous veggie stew, Niah learns to not let a bad experience, get in the way of doing good. / When the inexperienced Rona has to step in for Donna, the team makes sure everyone has the best camping trip ever.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep16
programme.desc: Divewings - When sea-dwelling dragons called Divewings start attacking ships near the island, the Rescue Riders have to find out what's making them so upset.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep31
programme.desc: The Case Of The Pink Lettuces - Something very strange is happening at the farm – all Farmer Tom's lettuces have been painted pink! Farmer Tom is really upset so Noddy offers to investigate. After talking to PatPat and Smartysaurus he realises that the Ninjas had asked Smartysaurus to make them pink paint so that they could paint the lettuces. They were using them as pom-poms to cheerlead Pink Ninja as she ran the Toyland Marathon Race! The Ninjas are very sorry that they upset Farmer Tom but he tells them that it's alright. They're welcome to his lettuces but next time, they should ask first! The race takes place and Pink Ninja wins! Thanks Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep32
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Jigsaw Puzzle Pieces - When some pieces from Big Ears' jigsaw puzzle go missing, Noddy investigates: where are the missing pieces? He soon realises someone must have taken them and draws up a list of suspects. Having discounted the Pirates and then the Naughticorns, Noddy is baffled. But when Pat-Pat and the Pockets invite him to share a piece of toy cake, Noddy suddenly has a breakthrough: maybe it wasn't one toy who took lots of pieces but lots of toys who each took one piece. Cloppycorn, Deltoid, Smartysaurus and Carlton all admit they took one piece. They didn't think they were doing any harm! Big Ears gets all the missing pieces back and everyone is at last able to enjoy his jigsaw puzzle of Toyland. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep38
programme.desc: A Star Is Hatched / Say Cheese - After stumbling into Finly’s music performance, Archibald’s unique sound leads to a hit record. But as the pressures of fame and success loom over the band, they struggle to recreate that "Archibald sound" and recapture lightning in a bottle. / When the Strutters need a family portrait, they meet a burnt out photographer named Randy. After accidentally wrecking his studio, Archibald decides he’s going to help Randy rekindle his passion for photography.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep37
programme.desc: Bait With Destiny / Sappy Together - Eep gets jealous when Thunk is invited to join the hunters/Grug and Gran must work together after getting stuck to each other with sticky tree sap

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep10
programme.desc: Lucky And The Harvest Hunt - Lucky takes part in a secret Miradero tradition a nighttime scavenger hunt

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep36
programme.desc: The Puppets Take Meanhattan / Zen & the Art of Video Game Patience - Lucretia learns that her puppeteer idol isn't a very nice person. Audrey battles her big sister for the best score on an old arcade game.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep36
programme.desc: Ransom Of White Shadow/Kicked Off - White Shadow is mistaken for a celebrity snail and kidnapped; Tito gets a foosball table which quickly becomes a soccer battle ground.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep4
programme.desc: Gopher it! / A Glamping We Will Go - When a pesky gopher gets in the way of Fawna making her famous veggie stew, Niah learns to not let a bad experience, get in the way of doing good. / When the inexperienced Rona has to step in for Donna, the team makes sure everyone has the best camping trip ever.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep50
programme.desc: CJ Wooferbug/What Did I Miss - DJ is excited to give her niece CJ her own wooferbug for her birthday. But the wooferbug proves difficult to transport across Trolls Village. Will DJ be able to get it to CJ before CJ’s birthday party ends?/When Peppy takes an entire day to get a new haircut, he asks Poppy to fill him in on what he missed. What follows is a series of short sketches, as we explore an average day in Troll Village.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep16
programme.desc: Shiny Leaf/Roundy - Leaf freaks out when he finds a blemish on his butt before a body building competition and Twig tries desperately to snap him out of his existential crisis. / Berry gets jealous when Rocksy starts spending all of her time with a marble, and tries various attempts to make the marble "disappear."

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep50
programme.desc: Little Lamb - When Puss and Dulcinea tracked down the Grotto of Riches, they each have their own plan on how to convince Mary and her flock to help find the Obelisk

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep9
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Strange Strife of the Smelly Socktopus - After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep10
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Flustering Mindless Woe of the Flushable Memory Wipes - After being made fun of for sitting in chocolate pudding, George and Harold go into hiding only to come back to find that everybody has forgotten who they are

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep21
programme.desc: Edge Of Disaster Pt 1 - When Ruffnut is captured by Dragon Hunters, it's up to Astrid and Tuffnut to defend Dragon's Edge from the invading Dragon Hunter army Dragon's Edge from the invading Dragon Hunter army

programme.desc: Edge Of Disaster Pt 2 - Unaware of the war on Dragon's Edge, Hiccup, Snotlout and Johann discover an island full of dragons that have been wounded by the Dragon Hunters

programme.desc: Night of the White Bone Demon - In a giant sea battle, Po and the Kids manage to escape the pursuing police to make it to Volcano island and get some answers. Empress Xiao begins learning how to defend herself.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep41
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Players - It's time for the Toyland football match but the game can't go ahead until Noddy finds the missing players. Noddy discovers that someone misdirected Pat Pat and Deltoid so that they'd miss the match. Noddy finds the missing players and reunites everyone at the real football pitch but then Hoof disappears. Noddy discovers that Hoof misdirected the others because he wanted to be the best player. Hoof learns that football is a team sport where all the team members need to work together to make it the best game ever. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep42
programme.desc: The Case Of The Changed Basketball Hoop - Noddy's about to play a game of basketball with Big Ears and Deltoid when he realizes that the hoop has been fiddled with. Who could've done that and why? Noddy's investigation leads him to Fuse, who explains that he just wanted to help the toys that weren't as skilled as him. Everyone practises and realises that the best way to improve at sport is to keep practising. Well done Noddy.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep43
programme.desc: The Case Of The Ruined Crops - Farmer Tom is confused and upset when he finds all his trees and corn knocked over. Noddy decides to investigate: who spoiled Farmer Tom's crops? He soon discovers lots of strange heavy bags scattered all over the farm. Whose are they? Where did they come from? And what could they possibly have to do with Smartysaurus's new hot air balloon?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep44
programme.desc: The Case Of The Broken Pulley - The Head Builder isn't happy. Someone's been playing with the builders' stuff and now their pulley doesn't work. Noddy decides he needs to find out who did it before anything else goes wrong. Who broke the Builders' pulley?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep41
programme.desc: Raa Raa's Noisy Challenge - Crocky challenges Raa Raa to make a noise with everything in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. Will Raa Raa succeed?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep42
programme.desc: Catch The Page - Topsy is trying to read, but Raa Raa and the other jungle animals are all racing around making too much noise. Topsy is so upset she accidentally rips the last page from her book… can her friends set off on a noisy chase through the jungle to find it?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep43
programme.desc: Raa Raa Gets Squeaky - Raa Raa is in a particularly helpful mood and offers to help everyone take provisions for the picnic to Rockywockyville for them. But he doesn't arrive in time, everyone sets out to see what has happened to their noisy little lion friend

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep44
programme.desc: Wake Up Huffty - The animals are all looking forward to waking up early to watch the dawn chorus, but Huffty doesn't stir when the alarm goes off. Can Raa Raa and the others wake the sleeping elephant in time?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep206
programme.desc: The Traffic Jam - Granny and Grandpa Pig have invited Peppa and her family to lunch. On the way, Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig get caught in a very long traffic jam, so Grandpa Pig decides to bring the lunch to them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep207
programme.desc: Rock Pools - Granny and Grandpa Pig take Peppa and George to a beach with lots of rocks and little rock pools to explore. They all have fun with a little crab, a seashell and a fossil. Peppa rescues a little fish in her bucket and puts it back in the sea.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep208
programme.desc: Teddy's Day Out - Peppa and her family are having a picnic. Mr Zebra the Postman and Zoë Zebra are having a picnic too, so they decide to have one big picnic. When it’s home time, Peppa leaves her teddy behind.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep119
programme.desc: The Collection - Upon seeing Ron's stick collection, Froga learns for the first time what "a collection" is. Anna would like to create one of her own. The others have all one sticks, bubbles, sounds, tools. They help Anna to find her memories with her friends

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Fixing Things - Bubu catches a cold, he's unable to fix Ron's spinning top and Christopher's broken piano. While Bubu is resting, she "fixes" the broken items for him. Christopher's piano starts playing bubbles, Froga realizes she should leave the fixing to Bubu

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Sad Day with Blue - Blue's feeling sad, so we play Blue's Clues to figure out why. Along the way to figuring out Blue's Clues, we help our Felt Friends and Blues' friends from her school deal with emotions and feelings in different situations.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S1 Ep121
programme.desc: Blaze of Glory - Blaze and his driver AJ are introduced to a world of racing Monster Machines. But when a truck named Crusher uses dirty tricks to try and win the Championship Race, Blaze will do everything to help his friends and beat Crusher to the finish line.

programme.title: Deer Squad S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Over the rainbow / We're toast - The search for gold at the end of the rainbow leads the Deer Squad to an amazing Frost Mountain and a new deer friend! // The Deer Squad have to deal with a cheesy situation thanks to Sir Steel's latest invention - The Giant Toaster!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin - Mr Brown has forgotten to get Mrs Brown a Birthday present, Paddington decides to hold a surprise party. // Judy does not like Violin lessons so hides from Ms Potts. Paddington takes up the challenge. Watch out ears!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Paddington And The Scrapbook - Paddington decides to make a scrapbook of memories and tries to include all his friends to show Aunt Lucy.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Apple Pie - Tiny Chef bakes apple pie for the big contest, and after an accident, has to think fast to come up with a new entry.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep126
programme.desc: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait - The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep101
programme.desc: The Barbapapa Tree / The Barbababies' birthday - Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Captain Kelp / Teensy the Tardigrade - As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? // Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep202
programme.desc: Best in Flow - Baby and Teensy embrace their fancy side to win a dance contest for pets.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep116
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Anna and her friends are outside playing Ron's favorite game, Hide-and-Seek! Anna is the Seeker and quickly finds Froga, Christopher and Bubu. When the friends work together to try to find Ron, they realize he's found the best hiding spot of all.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep121
programme.desc: Bubble Trouble - Bubu's bubble maker invention works so well, it creates an enormous bubble that Christopher gets trapped in! He loves his journey soaring over the land - but his friends are desperate to rescue him!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep165
programme.desc: The Mysterious Visitor - Bubu is eager to meet a real space alien so he builds a homemade antenna and sound box to communicate with outer space. He is amazed when he and Ron discover two glowing eyes. It must be the space alien!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep166
programme.desc: The Squeaky Boots - Christopher leads the friends in a fun game of HIDE AND SEEK. But Froga soon realizes that her new boots are letting out a noisy SQEEEAK. When a pesky mosquito enters the picture and threatens to ruin the winning prize!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep167
programme.desc: The Greedy Gobbler - While Bubu and Christopher want to enjoy an hazelnut snack, their hazelnuts go missing! When Anna, Froga and Ron's chocolate snack also disappears, the friends are convinced it's the work of the GREEDY GOBBLER and the HAZELNUT PRANKSTERS.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep168
programme.desc: A Longchair for Ron - A sleeping spider squats Ron's swing, and he can't take a nap. He laments to Anna and Froga that he wishes he had a deck chair to sleep on. This gives them the idea to surprise him with one.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep209
programme.desc: Emily Elephant - There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep210
programme.desc: George's Friend - George and Rebecca Rabbit's little brother Richard each have a toy dinosaur but they are not very good at sharing their toys. Mummy Pig shows them that they can have much more fun at the playground if they play together, just like their big sisters.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep211
programme.desc: The Boat Pond - Peppa and her family and friends are playing at the pond with their toy boats. Everyone has a boat to play with except Rebecca Rabbit. Daddy Pig makes Rebecca a boat out of newspaper. Rebecca’s paper boat is so nice; everyone wants one.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep212
programme.desc: Mr Scarecrow - The birds keep eating the seeds from Grandpa Pig's flower garden. Peppa and George make a scarecrow, which stops the birds from eating. But Peppa is worried that the birds are hungry, so Granny Pig gives the birdies a birdfeeder with their own seeds.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep509
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Game - Daddy teaches Peppa and George a fun game to play while they wait inside for the rain to stop.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep510
programme.desc: Mummy Rabbit's Bump - Everyone is excited when Mummy Rabbit arrives with some big news-she is pregnant! Will it be one baby or twins?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep511
programme.desc: Pedro the Cowboy - Pedro Pony pretends he is a proper cowboy, telling everyone stories in the camp he has set up in the garden.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep114
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt - Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep106
programme.desc: It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle - Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S5 Ep507
programme.desc: Ice Cream Monster Machine - Gasquatch invites Blaze and AJ to his ice cream party! But he forgot something important - the ice cream! So, Blaze transforms into an Ice Cream Truck and races to reach Gasquatch's house in time!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S5 Ep511
programme.desc: Recycling Power! - When Axle City is visited by a littering raccoon, it's up to Blaze to save the day as a Super Recycling Truck! He cleans up the town and rescues his friends - just in time for a final showdown with the Litter Critter!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S5 Ep515
programme.desc: Big Rig Blaze - When a windstorm blows away the supplies for Stripes' Animal Party, Blaze transforms into the one Monster Machine strong enough to haul it all back - a Big Rig! There's nothing he can't pull with that Big Rig Force!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S5 Ep519
programme.desc: The Treat Thief - Officer Blaze just got his biggest case yet: tracking down the mischievous Treat Thief! With help from Officer Anna, Blaze sets out to stop the thief and recover every stolen treat!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S6 Ep603
programme.desc: Dino Derby - Today, dinosaur Blaze is teaming up with his prehistoric pal Zeg to compete in... the Dino Derby! But will this dino duo have what it takes to outrace the rest and become Dino Derby champions?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S6 Ep606
programme.desc: Sparkle's Racing Badge - It's more Blaze family fun in this high octane, action-packed adventure as Blaze and his sister Sparkle team up to make it back to the Monster Dome in time for a big race.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S6 Ep610
programme.desc: Starla's Wild West Birthday - Starla's wild west birthday party is in trouble when her cake gets carried off by a runaway train. Can she, Blaze and AJ catch up and save the cake before it's too late?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S6 Ep614
programme.desc: The Tiger Treasure - Blaze, AJ, and Stripes put their explorer skills to the test as they follow the trail to the fabled Tiger Treasure

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S6 Ep618
programme.desc: The Fastest of them All - When a greedy queen casts a spell to make a few of our friends go slow, Blaze and AJ must race her for the magical cure

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S6 Ep620
programme.desc: Megabot! - Blaze and AJ help their amazing new friend Megabot get to Axle City in time for the big Robot Parade

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S6 Ep621
programme.desc: Pirate Musical! - In the first ever Blaze Musical, Blaze, AJ, Crusher, and Pickle are on a daring quest to find the pieces of the Broken Key and unlock a secret treasure

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S6 Ep623
programme.desc: Campfire Stories - It's a campout under the stars! Blaze, AJ, Starla, Crusher, and Pickle are gathered around the campfire to tell the most amazing stories they can make up! And the best part? Whoever tells the best story wins the last marshmallow!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep701
programme.desc: Sparkle's Big Rescue - When Crusher sends Blaze away with one of his latest cheats, Blaze's little sister Sparkle comes to save the day and bring her brother back in time so they can race together to win the Teamwork Trophy!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep111
programme.desc: The Pirate Parade - It's time for the annual Pirate Parade! That is, unless Escarlata has anything to say about it.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Yup Day - Baby convinces Daddy to say 'yup' to everything for a day. What's the worst that could happen?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep124
programme.desc: Swimming With The Sharks - Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Mac and Cheese - Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep507
programme.desc: Pups Save the Butterflies / Pups Save an Underground Chicken - Chickaletta is stuck on a runaway drone and mysterious butterflies are causing chaos all around Adventure Bay! // The statue of Chickaletta has been stolen by Mayor Humdinger and is making its way through Adventure Bay's underground tunnel system.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep221
programme.desc: Paddington Feels the Music - It's the Windsor Gardens Parade & Paddington has to lead it when Ms. Potts gets injured. Can Simi help him find the beat?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep217
programme.desc: Jumble Sale - Peppa’s playgroup is holding a jumble sale to raise money for a new roof and Madame Gazelle asks everyone to bring something to sell. Peppa and her friends bring in an old toy but they soon realise that favourite toys can be hard to let go of.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep218
programme.desc: Swimming - Peppa and her family are at the swimming pool. Rebecca Rabbit is there too. She and Peppa are very proud of their swimming skills. Everyone is surprised to discover that Daddy Pig is very good at swimming and diving. Very good indeed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep219
programme.desc: Foggy Day - Mummy and Daddy Pig are taking Peppa and George to play in the playground. On the way it gets a bit foggy, and soon it is so foggy they can’t see. They decide to go home. But which way is home?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep123
programme.desc: Prank Day - Today is Prank day, Anna and her friends must compete to elect the best prankster of all. Everyone's doing a great except Christopher. The friends are surprised when the worst prankster turns out to be the best!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep124
programme.desc: A Present for Ron - Christopher loves Ron's rock collection so much, he wants to add another beautiful rock to it! They set off on a journey to find the most amazing rock they can find. When they discover it - they must figure out a creative solution to get it to Ron!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Clock and Dance / Barbapileup - The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep111
programme.desc: Getting Glasses with Magenta - It's an exciting day for Magenta because she's getting glasses! We play a special game of Blue and Magenta's Clues to find out what Magenta wants to do when she gets her glasses and we get to go with her to meet.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep512
programme.desc: Pups Save the Snowshoeing Goodways / Pups Save a Duck Pond - When Mayor Goodway and the twins are late getting back from a snowshoeing, Jake and Everest call the Paw Patrol to search for them. // Water in the duck pond mysteriously drains out, it's up to the PAW Patrol find out what's happening!

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Meteor Mayhem / Dance Of Destruction - A meteor is heading for earth and Sir Steel's heroic efforts only make the Deer Squad's job in saving the planet even harder! // A dance competition in the Central Forest turns chaotic when Sir Steel uses his monkey suit to beat Rammy in the final.

programme.title: Deer Squad S2 Ep203
programme.desc: Were wig on the the loose / Lights Camera Action - When Sir Steel's high-tech wig malfunctions and goes on the rampage in Platinum City the Deer Squad race to the rescue. // The Deer Squad must think fast to save Lady Fluffpot when Sir Steel's filming turns into a Disaster Movie!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep112
programme.desc: Paddington Flies a Kite / Paddington the Detective - It's a windy day and Jonathan wishes to play kite with his dad. Since Mr. Brown is stuck at home, Paddington takes Jonathan to the park. // DAN Drainpipe Dan is stealing Mrs. Brown's wedding ring. Inspector Paddington of the yard is on his trail.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Pizza - Tiny Chef makes pizza and learns that friendship is more important than toppings when Ruby eats all the basil!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Boris / Born To Be Wild - The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep105
programme.desc: The Tenderest Bond of All / The Orange Empire - While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep110
programme.desc: Shadowland / Medievel Tides - Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park. // When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Slobber Slug - A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep122
programme.desc: Party Time - Anna and Froga want to throw a party..... since it is not a particular party day they decide to celebrate "Tomato Day", But Christopher ate all of the tomatoes ... so they need to find another name... Anna finds the perfect name: Friendship party!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep127
programme.desc: Impatient Christopher - Christopher can hardly wait for his birthday tomorrow, he delivers invitations to his friends, he tries to figure out what present they are preparing for him. Christopher learns that sleeping is the fastest way for tomorrow to come sooner!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep169
programme.desc: The Key - Because of her fear of spiders, Froga locks herself and Ron in the greenhouse to collecting Strawberries for the friends' Strawberry Snack time Musical Feast. But when it is time to leave, she can't locate the key...

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep170
programme.desc: Fruits Surprise - When Froga and Christopher realize that Anna and Bubu may be making a "fruit surprises" for Snack Time, they try everything they can to preserve the two surprises. Froga and Christopher realized how difficult preserving a surprise can be!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep171
programme.desc: Bubu's New Blue Jeans - Christopher has prepared his annual obstacle race and is excited for all the friends to participate. Bubu's new blue jeans are still drying so he has to wear his brand-new pair to the event, he becomes overly concerned of getting them dirty.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep172
programme.desc: Everywhere at Once - Anna has prepared her ice cream for everyone but forgets to place it in the freezer. - as she is trying to help all her friends at once, the ice cream melts! Is it ruined or can it be saved?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep223
programme.desc: GrandDad Dog's Garage - Peppa’s car runs out of petrol but thankfully Granddad Dog’s garage isn’t far away. With one phone call, Granddad Dog is on his way. He tows Peppa’s car back to his garage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep224
programme.desc: The Balloon Ride - Peppa wins the top prize in a raffle at school: a trip in a hot air balloon. Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, George and Peppa climb aboard and enjoy the flight until the balloon gets caught in a tree. Luckily, the balloon has landed in a very familiar garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep225
programme.desc: George Catches a Cold - Peppa and George love jumping in puddles, even when it’s raining – but when George takes off his rain hat, he catches a cold. After a while George is feeling much better. Now he’s more than happy to wear his rain hat, even when it’s not raining.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep226
programme.desc: The Eye Test - Pedro Pony wears glasses. Peppa thinks she might need glasses too, so Mummy Pig takes her to the optician. Peppa is a little disappointed to discover that she has perfect vision – but that doesn’t stop her wearing some rather fabulous sunglasses.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep512
programme.desc: Peppa and George's Garden - Grandpa Pig pops round with some seeds for Peppa and George. Daddy Pig helps out by being a scarecrow

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep513
programme.desc: The Flying Vet - Doctor Hamster is rushed off her feet when nearly all the animals need her help on the same day.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep514
programme.desc: Kylie Kangeroo - Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest?

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep115
programme.desc: Zero Waste - When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep108
programme.desc: The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches - The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep702
programme.desc: Mail Truck Blaze - When three big mail deliveries are needed around the world, there's only one monster machine who can deliver it all: Mail Truck Blaze! He'll swim across seas, climb mountains, and venture to the Monster Dome --because mail trucks ALWAYS deliver!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep701
programme.desc: Sparkle's Big Rescue - When Crusher sends Blaze away with one of his latest cheats, Blaze's little sister Sparkle comes to save the day and bring her brother back in time so they can race together to win the Teamwork Trophy!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep508
programme.desc: Pups Save a Bookmobile / Pups Save Heady Humdinger - When Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids of the mountains, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes off on a wild ride. // Mayor Humdinger has been carving his face into the cliffs of Adventure Bay!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep510
programme.desc: Pups Save the PawPaws / Pups Save a Popped Top - Carlos and Tracker make PawPaw juice with Paw Patrol when they find out Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta are in trouble. // The top of Farmer's Al's silo has been knocked off and he needs help saving his corn crop.

programme.title: Deer Squad S2 Ep204
programme.desc: Raining teddies / Party people - Jade's first sleepover is an eventful occasion when Stu & Safia make it rain teddies across the city and Central Forest! // Sir Steel is put out when he discovers he's not been invited to Lady Fluffpot's party but the Deer Squad are.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Steelzilla - Sir Steel holds a grand parade but his giant Steel blimp grows to Godzilla sized and trashes the city!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep110
programme.desc: Paddington and The Meteor Shower / Paddington and The Talent Show - Paddington has three chances to take a photo of a meteor shower using Mr. Gruber's antique camera. // Paddington enters Mr. Brown into the Townhall talent contest. However, Mr. Brown gets stage fright and Paddington must come to the rescue.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep111
programme.desc: Paddington and the Lost Gerbil / Paddington Earns a Ranger Badge - Paddington accidentally releases the school pet Gerbil that Judy is looking after. Paddington and Judy search for it in the house and in Mr. Curry's garden. // Jonathan and Paddington must get their Ranger badges but Mr. Curry is not happy with them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep304
programme.desc: The Library - Daddy Pig has a book from the library that he has kept for too long. The family go to the library to return it and find more books to read.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep305
programme.desc: The Camper Van - Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep306
programme.desc: The Camping Holiday - Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep307
programme.desc: Compost - Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep506
programme.desc: Rockin' Out - Goby and Gil go on a quest to get a geode at the top of a volcano! Will they make it back to the Rocky Valley Rock Show in time to enter the contest for best rock?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep112
programme.desc: Science with Blue - We learn about science today as we play Blue's Clues to figure out what experiment Blue wants to try. While we search for clues, we look at the world with our magnifying glass, meet the Sun, and learn a song about the planets!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep113
programme.desc: Story Time with Blue - We are almost ready to read but first we need to play Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite story! While looking for clues, we help Shovel & Pail act out "Jack & Jill" and match the three bears with their belongings.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Cecilia and the Magic Rubies / Under the Pirate Moon - Santi and crew go underwater to stop Escarlata la Pirata before she steals all the Magic Rubies from Giant Clam Reef! // It's a nighttime chase above and below the sea when Escarlata turns the moon into a fish.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep115
programme.desc: The Curse of the Gold Falcon - Santiago and crew set sail to return the Golden Falcon idol back to it's rightful resting place

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Shark-Off - Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep125
programme.desc: The Welcome Wagon - When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Potato Stew - Tiny Chef cooks pirate potato stew and uses a treasure map to find the special ingredient

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep16
programme.desc: The Rainbow Badge - The Squirrels see a rainbow for the very first time, but it disappears so quickly! Together they decide to create a rainbow themselves from everything around them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep17
programme.desc: The Dream Badge - The Squirrels are playing, but they can't stop thinking about the dreams they had last night. Duggee has his dream badge, so can he help the squirrels work out what their dreams mean.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep18
programme.desc: The Eating Badge - The Squirrels are having a picnic and notice that the chickens eat differently than they do. Duggee has his eating badge and can explain all the different ways animals eat.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep50
programme.desc: The Paddy Fields of China - The Go Jetters swing into action when they discover that Glitch is using real landmarks for his crazy golf course.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep1
programme.desc: Petra, Jordan - Can the Go Jetters rescue the ancient city of Petra when Glitch causes in an earthquake?

programme.title: Kit and Pup (S1) Ep30
programme.desc: Wood - Kit and Pup are trying to make a chair from pieces of wood, but Pup's ability to read instructions leaves a lot to be desired.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S3) Ep16
programme.desc: Shoes - Dee encourages a friend to say 'shoes' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! Dee see lots of different types of shoes - flashy shoes, dashy shoes, shiny shoes and even flying shoes!

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep94
programme.desc: Day Trip - The Teletubbies go on a day trip to the Hidey Hup. They take turns on The Tubby Bouncy, The Tubby Slidey and The Tubby Spinny before they go on The Tubby Uppy Downy together.

programme.title: Clangers (S3) Ep15
programme.desc: The Scary Thing - Out fishing in the music boat, Small catches a strange-looking object. He doesn't know what it is, but he thinks Tiny might like it, so he gives it to her as a present.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: The Thing That Fell Down - When one of the twinkles in the night sky falls to the ground, Bob wants to see it up close.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep16
programme.desc: Mega Stuck Truck - Team Tinpo's new mega-truck is so big it doesn't fit through the garage door!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep17
programme.desc: Apple Grapple - After a shaky start, the team discovers an easy way to pick apples.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep20
programme.desc: Coconut Safari Club - Monty is surprised when his family tell him that Jimmy Jones can't appreciate music because he's an animal.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep21
programme.desc: Never Mending Story - The Kazoops decide to replace their broken couch, but Monty doesn't think being broken makes something useless.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep22
programme.desc: Topsy Turvy Time - Monty is in a topsy-turvy mood and doing things a little bit differently, leaving him questioning why things always have to be same.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S3) Ep18
programme.desc: It Is Very Special And Extremely Ancient - Once they understand what a fossil actually is, Lola and Lotta are determined to find one, but Charlie isn't so sure they will.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep14
programme.desc: Smelly Breeze - Farmer Joe is spreading smelly seaweed on the field and the smell drifts over to Nelly and Nora.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep19
programme.desc: Rainbow's Niece - Sarah's new colour wheel reminds Rainbow that he has not seen his niece in a while.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep20
programme.desc: Decorating Donkey - Sarah plans a surprise for when her hibernating tortoise wakes up.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S16) Ep20
programme.desc: Happy Birthday Sir - On the Fat Controller's birthday, Thomas pulls into Brendam Docks where he meets Salty and Edward. Then the Fat Controller arrives in Winston, the new track inspection vehicle. The Fat Controller tells Thomas that, to celebrate his birthday, he is going shopping with his family.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S14) Ep1
programme.desc: Thomas' Tall Friend - Thomas has to take a very special passenger to the new safari park, will he make it on time?

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep22
programme.desc: Bus - During a game of bus, passenger Mum is too shy to tell bus driver Dad that she secretly loves him, until she gets some help from the Grannies.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: Turnip of Terror - Evil Pea tricks Supertato, and the Veggies, who fall into the Deli Counter and come face-to-face with the Turnip of Terror. They escape with help from the not so scary Turnip.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep19
programme.desc: The Delivery Badge - Chipmunk is cycling one day delivering his packages when he hits a rock and his trike falls apart! He has so many packages to deliver - what is he going to do now?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep20
programme.desc: The Same Badge - As Peggee and the Hummingbirds journey up the river to deliver a parcel, they have fun spotting and avoiding the wildlife that they meet along the way.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: The Drawing Badge - It's raining, so Duggee and the squirrels stay indoors to do some drawing.

programme.desc: The Matterhorn, Italy and Switzerland - Glitch gets into a mountain of trouble as the Go Jetters attempt to climb the Matterhorn.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep3
programme.desc: Bonneville Salt Flats, USA - Xuli and Glitch go head to head as they try to beat the Go Jet Academy land speed record.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep4
programme.desc: Rainforests of Sumatra, Indonesia - Can the Go Jetters save the world's stinkiest plant from becoming Glitch's latest perfume?

programme.desc: Naima's Algerian Borek - Naima is cooking a special Algerian Borek. Borek is made from pastry, mashed potato, meat, cheese and you can even add olives. She can't wait for her friends to taste it!

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animals (S1) Ep15
programme.desc: On the move - Andy Day tries to keep up with young animals on the move. In the Arctic, guillemot chicks leap from clifftop nests, and chacma baboons walk upright to reach the best food.

programme.title: Roger
programme.desc: Roger tells Fatou a joke and it’s a really stupid joke because Roger can’t tell it right and it’s really embarrassing for Fatou because she really doesn’t dare tell her friend that he is a terrible joke teller. Still, Roger is aware of his shortcomings and is sorry, he knows he blew it. He would like so much to make Fatou laugh with a good joke, kind of like Igor does. So he decides to take joke-telling lessons with Igor, since Igor is apparently the king of jokes. But it backfires, Roger is still way too serious! But still determined to make Fatou laugh at one of his jokes, the alien decides that science is the solution. He invents a laughter ray which accompanies his jokes and it turns out to work pretty well. In fact so well that Irina, who is inadvertently struck by the ray, can’t stop laughing herself...to the point of endangering her life...!

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: ABC News Ep41
programme.desc: Elias Clure presents the latest from ABC News, following the day's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: Offsiders Ep19
programme.desc: Kelli Underwood and the panel cover all the footy news and action ahead of State of Origin Game 1 in Adelaide on Wednesday 31 May. Plus the latest on AFL, NRL, A-League Finals and Super Rugby plus Super Netball and more.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 10 - Carlton v Collingwood Ep58
programme.desc: One of the showpiece matches on the AFL calendar. Two of the fiercest of rivals clash on a Sunday arvo at the MCG in Round 10 as the Carlton Blues take on the Collingwood Magpies.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep41
programme.desc: For the latest news as it happens ABC News is the home of breaking news, compelling stories and Australia's best investigative journalism. Round the clock coverage of the news that matters to you from the team you can trust.

programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: Pacific Island Food Revolution - Blue Foods - Fiji Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - The third season of this award-winning television show starts in our host country of Fiji, where our teams discover the importance of mangroves during their challenge to create the ultimate Seafood Platter.

programme.title: Magda's Big National Health Check Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Magda explores the links between our physical and mental health. She uncovers the rising tide of mental health conditions, as the leading chronic disease amongst young people today. (Final)

programme.title: Great Southern Landscapes - Rivers Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Rachel travels to the Hawkesbury River to find the exact spot where Arthur Streeton painted his 1896 masterpiece.

programme.title: And We Danced - Act 1 1962 - 1979 Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Australia's fever for ballet began in the early 20th century with the arrival of Anna Pavlova, and later, the Ballet Russes, who enraptured audiences and galvanized Australia's first ballet company - the Borovansky Ballet.

programme.title: Escape From The City - Port Stephens NSW: The Tajvidis Ep15
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Follow vegan couple Sam and Hanifa as they search for the dream rural retreat where they intend to expand their family and open an animal rescue centre for abandoned and neglected animals.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep12
programme.desc: Leigh Sales introduces the award-winning program with no narrator and no agendas. Immerse yourself in the life of an extraordinary Australian and their authentic stories, told in their own words.

programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.desc: The longest running show on Australian TV, this award-winning current affairs documentary series is a powerhouse of investigative journalism - fearless and forensic, holding power to account through six decades and counting.

programme.title: The World Ep102
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Beverley O'Connor presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Magda's Big National Health Check Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Magda explores the links between our physical and mental health. She uncovers the rising tide of mental health conditions, as the leading chronic disease amongst young people today. (Final)

programme.title: 7.30 Ep78
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep102
programme.desc: Follow the story with the latest on the day's events, explaining what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe uncovering what you need to know. Presented by Michael Tetlow.

programme.title: Media Watch Ep16
programme.desc: Everybody loves it until they're on it! Australia's leading forum for media analysis and comment, bringing you a fearless critique of the week's journalism, issues and events in the news. Presented by Paul Barry.

But perhaps not for long: the lively, inexpensive neighborhood has been discovered by real estate speculators.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC276AdesanyavsCannonieris
programme.desc: It was a night for Aussies at UFC 276 as Israel Adesanya defended his title against Jared Cannonier and Alexander Volkanovski faced Max Holloway for the third time. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep905AdesanyavsVettori2
programme.desc: Undefeated in the UFC at 185 pounds, reigning middleweight champion Israel Adesanya defends his title in a rematch against the “The Italian Dream” Marvin Vettori at UFC 263. See both men train and prepare to fight for UFC middleweight gold.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC278UsmanvsEdwards2
programme.desc: UFC 278 was headlined by a rematch between welterweight champion Kamaru “The Nigerian Nightmare” Usman and rival Leon “Rocky” Edwards. Plus, Luke Rockhold returned to action to face Paulo Costa. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep10
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep28
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep4
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts
programme.desc: Black History Month: Epic Knockouts - UFC Ultimate Knockouts brings you some of the most devastating finishes ever seen inside the Octagon.From one-punch knockouts to highlight reel kicks, you’ll seethe UFCs’s biggest names in their most memorable performances.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2310
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: 2023 Gran Premio Michelin de la República Argentina Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - MotoGP ™ returned to Argentina in 2014 after a long 15-year break, with the Termas de Rio Hondo circuit in the northern province of Santiago del Estero becoming the host venue for the Gran Premio de la Republica Argentina - a race that had previously been held in Buenos Aires. Indeed, the first ever Argentinean Grand Prix took place in 1961 close to Argentina’s capital, and was the first time that a GP had been run outside Europe. In the modern era Termas de Rio Hondo continues the legacy of motorcycle racing in Argentina. The annual visit to the South American country creates a festival atmosphere, providing a spectacular show on and off track.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2310
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Dern vs. Hill
programme.desc: Prelims - A classic striker versus grappler showdown hits the UFC APEX in Las Vegas on May 20 as Muay Thai specialist Angela Hill faces decorated jiu-jitsu black belt Mackenzie Dern in a five-round UFC Fight Night main event that holds serious implications for the strawweight division. Winner of two in a row, Hill expects to keep her hot streak going at the expense of Dern, who has ended more than half of her UFC wins by submission

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Dern vs. Hill
programme.desc: Main Event - A classic striker versus grappler showdown hits the UFC APEX in Las Vegas on May 20 as Muay Thai specialist Angela Hill faces decorated jiu-jitsu black belt Mackenzie Dern in a five-round UFC Fight Night main event that holds serious implications for the strawweight division. Winner of two in a row, Hill expects to keep her hot streak going at the expense of Dern, who has ended more than half of her UFC wins by submission

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Rozenstruik vs. Almeida
programme.desc: Prelims - In mixed martial arts, styles make fights, and in UFC Fight Night’s heavyweight main event on May 13 at Spectrum Center in Charlotte, fireworks are expected when striking specialist Jairzinho Rozenstruik chases his seventh UFC knockout victory against groundfighting ace Jailton Almeida. Brazil’s Almeida has taken the MMA world by storm since his win on Dana White’s Contender Series in 2021, going 4-0 with four finishes. But this Brazilian phenom will be put to the test by Suriname’s Rozenstruik, who is fresh from a 23-second knockout of Chris Daukaus

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Rozenstruik vs. Almeida
programme.desc: Main Event - In mixed martial arts, styles make fights, and in UFC Fight Night’s heavyweight main event on May 13 at Spectrum Center in Charlotte, fireworks are expected when striking specialist Jairzinho Rozenstruik chases his seventh UFC knockout victory against groundfighting ace Jailton Almeida. programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep906EdwardsvsDiaz

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC276AdesanyavsCannonieris
programme.desc: It was a night for Aussies at UFC 276 as Israel Adesanya defended his title against Jared Cannonier and Alexander Volkanovski faced Max Holloway for the third time. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep905AdesanyavsVettori2
programme.desc: Undefeated in the UFC at 185 pounds, reigning middleweight champion Israel Adesanya defends his title in a rematch against the “The Italian Dream” Marvin Vettori at UFC 263. See both men train and prepare to fight for UFC middleweight gold.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC278UsmanvsEdwards2
programme.desc: UFC 278 was headlined by a rematch between welterweight champion Kamaru “The Nigerian Nightmare” Usman and rival Leon “Rocky” Edwards. Plus, Luke Rockhold returned to action to face Paulo Costa. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep29
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep5
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2310
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: 2023 Gran Premio Michelin de la República Argentina Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - MotoGP ™ returned to Argentina in 2014 after a long 15-year break, with the Termas de Rio Hondo circuit in the northern province of Santiago del Estero becoming the host venue for the Gran Premio de la Republica Argentina - a race that had previously been held in Buenos Aires. Indeed, the first ever Argentinean Grand Prix took place in 1961 close to Argentina’s capital, and was the first time that a GP had been run outside Europe. In the modern era Termas de Rio Hondo continues the legacy of motorcycle racing in Argentina. The annual visit to the South American country creates a festival atmosphere, providing a spectacular show on and off track.
